alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Training thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Putnam and east central Clay Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm near Picolata, or 8 miles south of Green Cove Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. Affected area has received about 1 to 2 inches of rainfall. Storm could bring another 0.5 to 1 inch of rainfall. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Bostwick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
